maintext:
Grilling outdoors might not be an option right now, so bring the barbecue inside with this Ninja Foodi deal. For just one day, a factory reconditioned Ninja Foodi Indoor Grill is on sale at Woot!.
Factory Reconditioned Ninja Foodi Indoor Grill ($119, originally $199; woot.com)
Factory Reconditioned Ninja Foodi Indoor Grill
This indoor grill cooks your food with a super hot 500-degree, high density grill grate for great flavor and the perfect char marks every time, plus Cyclonic Grilling Technology allows 500-degree air to circulate for surround searing, so you won't even need to flip your food. It cooks just as fast as an outdoor grill, and can even transform frozen foods into a full-on, ready-to-eat meal in just 25 minutes.. Plus, its temperature-controlled grill grate, splatter shield and cool air zone means the grilling process remains virtually smoke free.
It's not just a grill, though. This four-in-one Ninja Foodi appliance also air fries, bakes and roasts. A digital control panel makes it easy to select your cooking function, cook time and temperature, so you're always in control. Not to mention, the ceramic-coated, removable parts are easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
You shouldn't notice any difference between this factory reconditioned Ninja Foodi and one that's brand new, but even so, you'll receive a 90-day warranty when you purchase.
This versatile indoor grill is on sale until midnight or while supplies last, so pick up yours now and get cooking ASAP. For more great deals, check out CNN Coupons.
Note: The prices above reflect the retailer's listed price at the time of publication.
